pages.text: A person with spiritual roots can enhance their control over a particular element by studying corresponding elemental mastery, and they have a chance to attach that element when casting related spells. Elemental Mastery I has a chance to inflict weak element; Elemental Mastery II has a chance to bestow weak element; Elemental Mastery III begins to have a low chance of imbuing strong element; Elemental Mastery IV has a chance to bestow strong element; Elemental Mastery V has a chance to bestow strong element.
